learning.title: Here are 10 crucial things you need to do to get the job, according to the experts

list.text: Do your research.
Don’t be afraid to sell yourself.
Have someone refer you.
Make sure your resume matches the job description.
Update your social media profiles.
Be prepared with thoughtful questions
Own your strengths but also your weaknesses.
Avoid only focusing on yourself.
Have an elevator pitch ready.
Follow up — and remind them why they should hire you.
